_a-0000eee8-b1ee-8000-9e5a-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_RemoveFieldsFromRuleConditionGroupVersions_Recursion

_a-0000e67d-efac-8000-9bcd-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QNM_QR_getRule

_a-0000ebe1-785a-8000-9d61-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QNM_incrementRuleVersion

_a-0000eed7-628f-8000-9e56-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QNM_QR_getRuleConditionGroups
_a-0000eed7-628f-8000-9e56-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!applyBatching: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!applyBatching,
    default: or(
      tointeger(ri!pagingInfo.batchSize) > cons!AS_GCM_CO_INT_QUERY_RECORD_MAX_BATCH_SIZE,
      tointeger(ri!pagingInfo.batchSize) =- 1,
      rule!AS_GAM_UT_ArrayLength(ri!ruleIds) > cons!AS_GCM_CO_INT_QUERY_RECORD_MAX_BATCH_SIZE
    )
  ),
  local!pagingInfo: if(
    local!applyBatching,
    #"urn:appian:function:v1:a:update"(
      ri!pagingInfo,
      "batchSize",
      cons!AS_GCM_CO_INT_QUERY_RECORD_MAX_BATCH_SIZE
    ),
    ri!pagingInfo
  ),
  local!returnType: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!returnType,
    default: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY
  ),
  local!fields: rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(
    {
      if(
        ri!includeRelatedRecords,
        {
          recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Group.rule,
          recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Group.conditionGroups,
          recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Group.conditions,
          recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Group.conditions,
          recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Group.conditions,
          recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Group.conditions,
          recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Group.conditions,
          recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Group.conditionGroups,
          recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Group.conditionGroups,
          #"urn:appian:record-relationship:v1:df718ee2-d9ba-4f1a-9500-07a07906abf5/f74e7d59-ff36-4de5-af0c-fd0c97d404c4/d34c79ff-bad5-433f-97b3-2c4e436f90da/4ccf47db-65e0-4898-8006-71425da23545",
          #"urn:appian:record-relationship:v1:df718ee2-d9ba-4f1a-9500-07a07906abf5/f74e7d59-ff36-4de5-af0c-fd0c97d404c4/d34c79ff-bad5-433f-97b3-2c4e436f90da/171b8c2a-6f40-47d3-8ea9-c785363d29c2",
          #"urn:appian:record-relationship:v1:df718ee2-d9ba-4f1a-9500-07a07906abf5/f74e7d59-ff36-4de5-af0c-fd0c97d404c4/d34c79ff-bad5-433f-97b3-2c4e436f90da/f70a9c59-efff-4627-a376-cdf2bb011595",
          #"urn:appian:record-relationship:v1:df718ee2-d9ba-4f1a-9500-07a07906abf5/f74e7d59-ff36-4de5-af0c-fd0c97d404c4/d34c79ff-bad5-433f-97b3-2c4e436f90da/836d8f15-66f2-42fa-876d-da367f40632b",
          #"urn:appian:record-relationship:v1:df718ee2-d9ba-4f1a-9500-07a07906abf5/f74e7d59-ff36-4de5-af0c-fd0c97d404c4/f74e7d59-ff36-4de5-af0c-fd0c97d404c4/f74e7d59-ff36-4de5-af0c-fd0c97d404c4",
          #"urn:appian:record-relationship:v1:df718ee2-d9ba-4f1a-9500-07a07906abf5/f74e7d59-ff36-4de5-af0c-fd0c97d404c4/f74e7d59-ff36-4de5-af0c-fd0c97d404c4/d34c79ff-bad5-433f-97b3-2c4e436f90da",
          #"urn:appian:record-relationship:v1:df718ee2-d9ba-4f1a-9500-07a07906abf5/f74e7d59-ff36-4de5-af0c-fd0c97d404c4/f74e7d59-ff36-4de5-af0c-fd0c97d404c4/d34c79ff-bad5-433f-97b3-2c4e436f90da/4ccf47db-65e0-4898-8006-71425da23545",
          #"urn:appian:record-relationship:v1:df718ee2-d9ba-4f1a-9500-07a07906abf5/f74e7d59-ff36-4de5-af0c-fd0c97d404c4/f74e7d59-ff36-4de5-af0c-fd0c97d404c4/d34c79ff-bad5-433f-97b3-2c4e436f90da/171b8c2a-6f40-47d3-8ea9-c785363d29c2",
          #"urn:appian:record-relationship:v1:df718ee2-d9ba-4f1a-9500-07a07906abf5/f74e7d59-ff36-4de5-af0c-fd0c97d404c4/f74e7d59-ff36-4de5-af0c-fd0c97d404c4/d34c79ff-bad5-433f-97b3-2c4e436f90da/f70a9c59-efff-4627-a376-cdf2bb011595",
          #"urn:appian:record-relationship:v1:df718ee2-d9ba-4f1a-9500-07a07906abf5/f74e7d59-ff36-4de5-af0c-fd0c97d404c4/f74e7d59-ff36-4de5-af0c-fd0c97d404c4/d34c79ff-bad5-433f-97b3-2c4e436f90da/836d8f15-66f2-42fa-876d-da367f40632b"
        },
        {}
      ),
      ri!fields,
      index(
        ri!relatedRecordData,
        "relationship",
        null
      )
    }
  ),
  local!flatLevelConditionGroupIds: rule!AS_CO_UT_queryRecord(
    recordType: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Group,
    returnType: a!defaultValue(
      value: ri!returnType,
      default: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY
    ),
    filters: {
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
        field: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Group.rule.isActive,
        operator: "=",
        value: ri!ruleIsActive,
        applywhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!ruleIsActive)
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
        field: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Group.ruleId,
        operator: "in",
        value: ri!ruleIds,
        applywhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!ruleIds)
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
        field: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Group.isActive,
        operator: "=",
        value: true(),
        applyWhen: ri!showInActive <> true
      ),
      /* Adding default filter to get only direct condition groups*/
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
        field: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Group.parentConditionGroupId,
        operator: "is null"
      ),
      ri!additionalFilters
    },
    logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
    fields: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Group.ruleConditionGroupId,
    pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
    triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
    executeWhen: and(
      ri!executeWhen,
      any(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank,
        { ri!additionalFilters, ri!ruleIds }
      )
    )
  )[recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Group.ruleConditionGroupId],
  rule!AS_GCM_UT_formatDataBasedOnReturnType(
    pagingInfo: local!pagingInfo,
    returnType: local!returnType,
    data: a!flatten(
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: local!flatLevelConditionGroupIds,
        expression: {
          rule!AS_GCM_UT_queryRecordByIdentifier(
            recordType: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Group,
            relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData,
            identifier: fv!item,
            fields: local!fields
          )
        }
      )
    )
  )
)

_a-0000ec50-376f-8000-9d94-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_UT_queryRecordByIdentifier
_a-0000ec50-376f-8000-9d94-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*

PLEASE REFER TO THE BOTTOM OF THIS RULE FOR INSTRUCTIONS ON HOW TO USE

Please DO NOT auto-format this rule

*/
a!localVariables(
  /*Determine the castResultToType*/
  local!castResultToType: a!defaultValue(ri!castToCdtType, ri!recordType),
  /*Execute the query*/
  local!queryResult: a!refreshVariable(
    value: if(
      ri!executeWhen = false,
      null(ri!recordType),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryRecordByIdentifier"(
        recordType: ri!recordType,
        identifier: ri!identifier,
        fields: rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(
          {
            ri!fields,
            index(
              ri!relatedRecordData,
              "relationship",
              null
            )
          }
        ),
        relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData
      )
    ),
    refreshOnVarChange: ri!triggerRefresh,
    refreshInterval: ri!refreshInterval,
    refreshAfter: { "RECORD_ACTION" }
  ),
  rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
    type: local!castResultToType,
    value: local!queryResult
  )
)/*

DOCUMENTATION

This rule is designed to minimize the overhead with querying data and then casting the result


Required Inputs:

1. recordType
- This is a recordtype! input of the data type to be queried against

2. identifier
- The primary key of the record type which needs to be queried

Optional Inputs:

3. executeWhen
- The query will not execute if this is false, the query will execute if this is true or null
-- This is meant to operate in a similar manner to the showWhen parameter of components
- Use this to skip execution of a query without needing to wrap if() statements around the rule
-- Examples of this would be to skip querying if your filter value is a null ID
- If the query does not execute, this will return a null value whose type is based on the returnType input

4. triggerRefresh
- By default, the query will always re-execute whenever any inputs change
- However, by updating the value of triggerRefresh, you can also trigger a re-execution even if none of the other inputs change (e.g. after a record action)

5. castToCdtType
- Any cdt type to the cast the result set. 

6. fields
- The record fields that need to be queried

7. relatedRecordData
- the relatedRecordData in which the filters and limit can be specified for each relationship

*/

_a-0000ec90-d194-8000-9dac-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_updateDataByModifierMaps_Reducer
_a-0000ec90-d194-8000-9dac-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  and(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(
      input: index(ri!data, ri!modifierMap.field, null)
    ),
    ri!modifierMap.applyWhen
  ),
  #"urn:appian:function:v1:a:update"(
    ri!data,
    ri!modifierMap.field,
    a!match(
      value: ri!modifierMap,
      whenTrue: and(
        a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!modifierMap.findRegex),
        a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!modifierMap.find)
      ),
      then: error(
        "Only one of two parameters should have values: findRegex or find"
      ),
      whenTrue: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!modifierMap.findRegex),
      then: if(
        a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!modifierMap.instanceNum),
        error(
          "instanceNum should be null when passing a value to findRegex"
        ),
        regexreplaceall(
          ri!modifierMap.findRegex,
          ri!data[ri!modifierMap.field],
          ri!modifierMap.replaceWith
        )
      ),
      whenTrue: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!modifierMap.find),
      then: rule!AS_GCM_substituteListFromTextUsingReduce(
        text: ri!data[ri!modifierMap.field],
        find: ri!modifierMap.find,
        replaceWith: ri!modifierMap.replaceWith,
        instanceNum: ri!modifierMap.instanceNum,
        replaceAllInstances: a!defaultValue(
          value: ri!modifierMap.replaceAllInstances,
          default: a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!modifierMap.instanceNum)
        )
      ),
      default: error(
        "Alteast one of two parameters should have values: findRegex or find"
      )
    )
  ),
  ri!data
)

_a-0000ec90-d194-8000-9dac-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_updateDataByModifierMaps
_a-0000ec90-d194-8000-9dac-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*
The modifierMaps should have the below structure
{
a!map(
field: <The field which needs to be modified>,
find: Optional when findRegex is provided - The value to find,
findRegex: Optional when find is provided - The regex search performed to replace the value,
replaceWith: The value to replace with. When left blank the find values will be removed,
instanceNum: The instance number to which replace. Use only when the find is passed,
replaceAllInstances: Default true - Determines whether all the instances need to be replaced
applyWhen: When false this map will be skipped
),
...
}
*/
if(
  rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!modifierMaps),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    items: ri!data,
    expression: reduce(
      rule!AS_GCM_updateDataByModifierMaps_Reducer(data: _, modifierMap: _),
      fv!item,
      ri!modifierMaps
    )
  ),
  ri!data
)

000bee46-cb84-8000-d987-7f0000014e7a.name: AS GCM CEDM Write Rule Version Data

_a-0000e6e4-7cee-8000-9bde-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QNM_QR_getRuleConditions
_a-0000e6e4-7cee-8000-9bde-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!applyBatching: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!applyBatching,
    default: or(
      tointeger(ri!pagingInfo.batchSize) > cons!AS_GCM_CO_INT_QUERY_RECORD_MAX_BATCH_SIZE,
      tointeger(ri!pagingInfo.batchSize) =- 1,
      rule!AS_GAM_UT_ArrayLength(ri!mapIds) > cons!AS_GCM_CO_INT_QUERY_RECORD_MAX_BATCH_SIZE
    )
  ),
  local!pagingInfo: if(
    local!applyBatching,
    #"urn:appian:function:v1:a:update"(
      ri!pagingInfo,
      "batchSize",
      cons!AS_GCM_CO_INT_QUERY_RECORD_MAX_BATCH_SIZE
    ),
    ri!pagingInfo
  ),
  local!returnType: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!returnType,
    default: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY
  ),
  local!fields: rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(
    {
      if(
        ri!includeRelatedRecords,
        {
          recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition.question,
          recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition.refClauseData,
          recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition.refOperator,
          recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition.response
        },
        {}
      ),
      ri!fields,
      index(
        ri!relatedRecordData,
        "relationship",
        null
      )
    }
  ),
  rule!AS_GCM_UT_formatDataBasedOnReturnType(
    pagingInfo: local!pagingInfo,
    returnType: local!returnType,
    data: a!match(
      value: null,
      /*  Happy Path scenario when batching is not needed  */
      whenTrue: and(
        ri!executeWhen,
        not(local!applyBatching)
      ),
      then: rule!AS_CO_UT_queryRecord(
        recordType: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition,
        returnType: a!defaultValue(
          value: ri!returnType,
          default: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY
        ),
        filters: {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition.mapId,
            operator: "in",
            value: ri!mapIds
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition.question.questionTemplateId,
            operator: "in",
            value: ri!questionTemplateId,
            applywhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!questionTemplateId)
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition.response.responseTemplateId,
            operator: "in",
            value: ri!responseTemplateId,
            applywhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!responseTemplateId)
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition.ruleId,
            operator: "in",
            value: ri!ruleIds,
            applywhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!ruleIds)
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition.isActive,
            operator: "=",
            value: true(),
            applyWhen: ri!showInActive <> true
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition.rule.isActive,
            operator: "=",
            value: ri!ruleIsActive
          ),
          /* Adding default filter to get only direct conditions*/
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition.ruleConditionGroupId,
            operator: "is null",
            applyWhen: not(
              rule!AS_AM_CO_UT_booleanDefaultFalse(ri!includeDirectAndIndirectConditions)
            )
          ),
          ri!additionalFilters
        },
        logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
        fields: local!fields,
        pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
        aggregationFields: ri!aggregationFields,
        triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
        sort: ri!sort,
        executeWhen: and(
          ri!executeWhen,
          any(
            rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank,
            {
              ri!additionalFilters,
              ri!mapIds,
              ri!questionTemplateId,
              ri!responseTemplateId,
              ri!ruleIds
            }
          )
        ),
        relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData
      ),
      whenTrue: and(
        ri!executeWhen,
        local!applyBatching,
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!mapIds)
      ),
      then: a!localVariables(
        /*   Querying the total count to apply batching     */
        local!totalCount: rule!AS_CO_UT_queryRecord(
          recordType: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition,
          returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_TOTAL_COUNT,
          executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
          triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
          filters: {
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
              field: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition.question.questionTemplateId,
              operator: "in",
              value: ri!questionTemplateId,
              applywhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!questionTemplateId)
            ),
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
              field: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition.response.responseTemplateId,
              operator: "in",
              value: ri!responseTemplateId,
              applywhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!responseTemplateId)
            ),
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
              field: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition.ruleId,
              operator: "in",
              value: ri!ruleIds,
              applywhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!ruleIds)
            ),
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
              field: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition.isActive,
              operator: "=",
              value: true(),
              applyWhen: ri!showInActive <> true()
            ),
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
              field: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition.rule.isActive,
              operator: "=",
              value: ri!ruleIsActive
            ),
            /* Adding default filter to get only direct conditions*/
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
              field: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition.ruleConditionGroupId,
              operator: "is null",
              applyWhen: not(
                rule!AS_AM_CO_UT_booleanDefaultFalse(ri!includeDirectAndIndirectConditions)
              )
            ),
            ri!additionalFilters
          },
          logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression
        ),
        if(
          local!totalCount > 0,
          a!flatten(
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
              items: enumerate(
                ceiling(
                  local!totalCount / local!pagingInfo.batchSize
                )
              ),
              expression: rule!AS_CO_UT_queryRecord(
                recordType: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition,
                returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_DATA_SUBSET,
                executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
                pagingInfo: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(
                  startIndex: fv!item * local!pagingInfo.batchSize + 1,
                  batchSize: local!pagingInfo.batchSize
                ),
                sort: ri!sort,
                triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
                filters: {
                  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
                    field: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition.question.questionTemplateId,
                    operator: "in",
                    value: ri!questionTemplateId,
                    applywhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!questionTemplateId)
                  ),
                  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
                    field: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition.response.responseTemplateId,
                    operator: "in",
                    value: ri!responseTemplateId,
                    applywhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!responseTemplateId)
                  ),
                  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
                    field: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition.ruleId,
                    operator: "in",
                    value: ri!ruleIds,
                    applywhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!ruleIds)
                  ),
                  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
                    field: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition.isActive,
                    operator: "=",
                    value: true(),
                    applyWhen: ri!showInActive <> true()
                  ),
                  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
                    field: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition.rule.isActive,
                    operator: "=",
                    value: ri!ruleIsActive
                  ),
                  /* Adding default filter to get only direct conditions*/
                  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
                    field: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition.ruleConditionGroupId,
                    operator: "is null",
                    applyWhen: not(
                      rule!AS_AM_CO_UT_booleanDefaultFalse(ri!includeDirectAndIndirectConditions)
                    )
                  ),
                  
                },
                fields: local!fields,
                relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData,
                castToCdtType: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition
              ).data
            )
          ),
          {}
        )
      ),
      whenTrue: and(
        ri!executeWhen,
        local!applyBatching,
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!mapIds),
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(value: ri!aggregationFields)
      ),
      then: a!flatten(
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
          /*   batches       */
          items: rule!AS_GCM_UT_getIdentifiersInBatches(
            identifiers: rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(array: ri!mapIds),
            batchingSize: cons!AS_GCM_CO_INT_QUERY_RECORD_MAX_BATCH_SIZE,
            returnType: local!returnType,
            pagingInfo: local!pagingInfo
          ),
          expression: rule!AS_CO_UT_queryRecord(
            recordType: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition,
            returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_DATA_SUBSET,
            executeWhen: and(
              ri!executeWhen,
              rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(fv!item.identifiers)
            ),
            pagingInfo: local!pagingInfo,
            sort: ri!sort,
            triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
            filters: {
              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
                field: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition.mapId,
                operator: "in",
                value: tointeger(fv!item.identifiers)
              ),
              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
                field: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition.isActive,
                operator: "=",
                value: true(),
                applyWhen: ri!showInActive <> true()
              ),
              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
                field: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition.rule.isActive,
                operator: "=",
                value: ri!ruleIsActive
              ),
              /* Adding default filter to get only direct conditions*/
              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
                field: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition.ruleConditionGroupId,
                operator: "is null",
                applyWhen: not(
                  rule!AS_AM_CO_UT_booleanDefaultFalse(ri!includeDirectAndIndirectConditions)
                )
              ),
              
            },
            fields: local!fields,
            relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData,
            castToCdtType: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition
          ).data
        )
      ),
      default: {}
    )
  )
)

_a-0000e6c8-d132-8000-9bbe-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_queryRecord

_a-0000e897-ddd7-8000-9c0c-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_UT_formatDataBasedOnReturnType

_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_filterRecords
_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!fieldValuePairs: a!defaultValue(
    ri!fieldValuePairs,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: a!flatten(ri!field),
      expression: a!map(
        field: fv!item,
        value: if(
          fv!itemCount = 1,
          ri!value,
          index(a!flatten(ri!value), fv!index, null)
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  local!matchIndices: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(a!flatten(ri!records)),
    tointeger({}),
    reduce(
      rule!AS_GCM_filterRecords_Reducer(
        previousIndices: _,
        records: a!flatten(ri!records),
        fieldValuePair: _
      ),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1,
      local!fieldValuePairs
    )
  ),
  local!rejectIndices: difference(
    if(
      a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!records),
      tointeger({}),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1
    ),
    local!matchIndices
  ),
  local!matches: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!matchIndices, {})
  ),
  local!rejects: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!rejectIndices, {})
  ),
  local!output: a!match(
    value: a!defaultValue(ri!filterType, "FILTER"),
    equals: "FILTER",
    then: local!matches,
    equals: "REJECT",
    then: local!rejects,
    equals: "FIRST_MATCH",
    then: index(local!matches, 1, null),
    equals: "FIRST_REJECT",
    then: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
    equals: "MATCH_COUNT",
    then: count(local!matchIndices),
    equals: "REJECT_COUNT",
    then: count(local!rejectIndices),
    equals: "MATCH_INDICES",
    then: local!matchIndices,
    equals: "REJECT_INDICES",
    then: local!rejectIndices,
    equals: "FULL_RESULT",
    then: a!map(
      matches: local!matches,
      rejects: local!rejects,
      firstMatch: index(local!matches, 1, null),
      firstReject: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
      matchCount: count(local!matchIndices),
      rejectCount: count(local!rejectIndices),
      matchIndices: local!matchIndices,
      rejectIndices: local!rejectIndices
    ),
    default: fn!error(
      "Invalid filterType, must be one of: FILTER, REJECT, FIRST_MATCH, FIRST_REJECT, MATCH_COUNT, REJECT_COUNT, MATCH_INDICES, REJECT_INDICES, FULL_RESULT"
    )
  ),
  local!output
)
